name: Pidgey

evolution.description: Pidgey can evolve into Pidgeotto at level 6 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 7 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Tiny Bird Pokémon. Very docile. If attacked, it will often kick up sand to protect itself rather than fight back.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.description: This Pokémon ignores disadvantage when it relates to sight.

abilities.name: Tangled Feet
abilities.description: Attacks against this Pokémon have disadvantage when it is confused.

abilities.name: Big Pecks
abilities.description: This Pokémon's AC cannot be reduced by an opponent's moves.
